subject: Golf
organizations: Champions Tour Bank of America Championship at Nashawtuc Country Club
lead_paragraph: Loren Roberts shot a second-day 66 to take a one-stroke lead heading into the final round of the Champions Tour Bank of America Championship at Nashawtuc Country Club in Concord, Mass. Roberts, who had three-putted from 30 feet for a double bogey on No. 9, birdied the 18th to move to 10 under par, one stroke ahead of Mark McNulty (70), Jeff Sluman (67) and the first-round leader, Tom Kite (72).
